nodes.text: Ealewon was a company that produced the A-212 Tracing Console, a model of computer available during the Galactic Civil War.

Ealewon was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Galladinium's Fantastic Technology, a 1995 roleplaying supplement for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
